get.description:
For example for filter string is ?filter_by_field=name&filter_by_value=%mi%

parameters.name: exact_result
parameters.description: exact_result = 2 -> return only the LAST versions of archives, exact_result = 1 -> return only founded versions of archives, exact_result = 0 -> return all versions of founded archive

parameters.name: by_last
parameters.description: by_last = 1 -> Filter only in the last versions of archives, = 0 - filter for the all  versions

parameters.name: return_values
parameters.description: Set list of returning values in JSON array format (if empty - return all)
